component.name: Lamco RDP Server
component.summary: Remote desktop sharing for Wayland via RDP

description.p: Lamco RDP Server lets you share your Linux desktop session with any standard RDP client. Built for Wayland compositors, it provides hardware-accelerated H.264 video encoding, full keyboard and mouse input, bidirectional clipboard with file transfer, and audio streaming.
The graphical interface provides configuration and management across ten tabs covering server settings, security, video encoding, graphics pipeline, performance tuning, and live session monitoring.
Works with GNOME, KDE Plasma, Sway, and Hyprland through XDG Desktop Portals and PipeWire. Connect from Windows, macOS, or Linux using any standard RDP client.
Free for personal use, non-profits, and small businesses (3 or fewer employees AND less than $1M revenue). Commercial use requires a license. Converts to Apache-2.0 on December 31, 2028.
